Int main(){

int p=3, h[300] , b[40]

h[10]=3;
b[4]=-1;
h[20]=b[4] + h[10] + p;
return 0;
}



p->%l0
h->%l1
b->%l2

0x0000|OR %g0,3,%l0
0x0004|OR %g0,0,%l1
0x0008|OR %g0,1200,%l2
0x000c|OR %g0,3,%l3
0x0010|ST %l3,%l1,40
0x0014|OR %go,-1,%l4
0x0018|ST %l4,%l2,16
0x001c|ADD %l0,%l3,%l0
0x0020|ADD %l0,%l4,%l0
0x0024|ST  %l0,%l1,80
0x0028|OR %g0,0,%o1


10100000000100000010000000000011   A0102003
10100010000100000010000000000000   A2102000
10100100000100000010010010110000   A41024B0
10100110000100000010000000000011   A6102003
11100110001001000110000000101000   E6246028
10101000000100000011111111111111   A8103FFF
11101000001001001010000000010000   E824A010
10100000000001000000000000010011   A0040013
10100000000001000000000000010100   A0040014
11100000001001000110000001010000   E0246050
10010010000100000010000000000000   92102000
